node_info.name: activeCampaign
node_info.description: Create and edit data in ActiveCampaign
node_info.subtitle: ={{$parameter["operation"] + ": " + $parameter["resource"]}}

metadata.details: ActiveCampaign is a cloud software platform that allows customer experience automation, which combines email marketing, marketing automation, sales automation, and CRM categories. Use this node when you want to interact with your ActiveCampaign account.

options.description: Filter contacts associated with the given list

options.name: search
options.description: Filter contacts that match the given value in the contact names, organization, phone or email

options.description: Return only contacts that match a list segment

options.description: Filter contacts associated with the given automation

options.description: Filter contacts associated with the given tag

options.description: Filter contacts that were updated before this date

properties.description: The name of the service

properties.name: externalid
properties.description: The ID of the account in the external service

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name associated with the account in the external service. Often this will be a company name (e.g., "My Toystore, Inc.").

properties.name: logoUrl
properties.description: The URL to a logo image for the external service

properties.name: linkUrl
properties.description: The URL to a page where the integration with the external service can be managed in the third-party's website

options.name: service
options.description: The name of the service

options.name: externalid
options.description: The ID of the account in the external service

options.name: name
options.description: The name associated with the account in the external service. Often this will be a company name (e.g., "My Toystore, Inc.").

options.name: logoUrl
options.description: The URL to a logo image for the external service

options.name: linkUrl
options.description: The URL to a page where the integration with the external service can be managed in the third-party's website

options.name: status
options.description: The status of the connection (0 = error; 1 = connected)

options.name: syncStatus
options.description: The status of a sync triggered on the connection (0 = sync stopped; 1 = sync running)

properties.name: connectionId
properties.description: ID of the connection to delete

properties.name: connectionId
properties.description: ID of the connection to get

properties.name: externalid
properties.description: The ID of the order in the external service. ONLY REQUIRED IF EXTERNALCHECKOUTID NOT INCLUDED.

properties.name: externalcheckoutid
properties.description: The ID of the cart in the external service. ONLY REQUIRED IF EXTERNALID IS NOT INCLUDED.

properties.name: source
properties.description: The order source code (0 - will not trigger automations, 1 - will trigger automations)

properties.name: email
properties.description: The email address of the customer who placed the order

properties.name: totalPrice
properties.description: The total price of the order in cents, including tax and shipping charges. (i.e. $456.78 => 45678). Must be greater than or equal to zero.

properties.name: currency
properties.description: The currency of the order (3-digit ISO code, e.g., "USD")

properties.name: connectionid
properties.description: The ID of the connection from which this order originated

properties.name: customerid
properties.description: The ID of the customer associated with this order

properties.name: externalCreatedDate
properties.description: The date the order was placed

properties.name: abandonedDate
properties.description: The date the cart was abandoned. REQUIRED ONLY IF INCLUDING EXTERNALCHECKOUTID.

properties.name: orderProducts
properties.description: All ordered products

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the product

options.name: price
options.description: The price of the product, in cents. (i.e. $456.78 => 45678). Must be greater than or equal to zero.

options.name: quantity
options.description: The quantity ordered

options.name: externalid
options.description: The ID of the product in the external service

options.name: category
options.description: The category of the product

options.name: sku
options.description: The SKU for the product

options.name: description
options.description: The description of the product

options.name: imageUrl
options.description: An Image URL that displays an image of the product

options.name: productUrl
options.description: A URL linking to the product in your store

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: The total shipping amount for the order in cents

options.name: shippingAmount
options.description: The total shipping amount for the order in cents

options.name: taxAmount
options.description: The total tax amount for the order in cents

options.name: discountAmount
options.description: The total discount amount for the order in cents

options.name: orderUrl
options.description: The URL for the order in the external service

options.name: externalUpdatedDate
options.description: The date the order was updated

options.name: shippingMethod
options.description: The shipping method of the order

options.name: orderNumber
options.description: The order number. This can be different than the externalid.

notes.name: Notes
notes.description: Optional note to save with the node

notesInFlow.name: Display Note in Flow?
notesInFlow.description: If active, the note above will display in the flow as a subtitle

alwaysOutputData.name: Always Output Data
alwaysOutputData.description: If active, will output a single, empty item when the output would have been empty. Use to prevent the workflow finishing on this node

executeOnce.name: Execute Once
executeOnce.description: If active, the node executes only once, with data from the first item it receives

retryOnFail.name: Retry On Fail
retryOnFail.description: If active, the node tries to execute again when it fails

maxTries.name: Max. Tries
maxTries.description: Number of times to attempt to execute the node before failing the execution

waitBetweenTries.name: Wait Between Tries (ms)
waitBetweenTries.description: How long to wait between each attempt (in milliseconds)

onError.name: On Error
onError.description: Action to take when the node execution fails

options.name: Stop Workflow
options.description: Halt execution and fail workflow

options.name: Continue
options.description: Pass error message as item in regular output

options.name: Continue (using error output)
options.description: Pass item to an extra `error` output

settings.note: Executable nodes have both common and executable settings
